description: Item 1 - Lime x 2 (right boundary): Reduce by approximately 3 metres. Routine maintenance leaving a finished height of approx. 9m and finished spread of 4.5mItem 2 - Plum (right hand boundary): Reduce by approximately 1.5 metres. To maintain shape, mitigate sprawl over access road and neighbour and pavement leaving a finished height of 5m and finished width of 4m Item 3 - Lime x 2 (front boundary): Reduce by approximately 2 metres, raise over the road and footway to clear the foot path by up to 3m Routine maintenanceItem 4 - Sorbus: Reshape/balance the canopy by pruning up to 1m from the height and width To maintain balance and shape leaving a finished height of 4m and finished width of 2/3mItem 7- Lilac: Lightly shape/reduce the canopy and lift over the lawn. Routine maintenance leaving a finished height of 2m and finished spread of 1.5m Item 8 - Elder: Repollard at a finished height 1.8 metres. Routine maintenance reduce by approx. 1.5m to leave a finished height of 1.8m width to remain the sameItem 9 - Hazel: Reduce height by 1.8m to 1.8 metres. Routine maintenance width to remain the sameItem 10 - Lime: Reduce by approximately 2.5 metres from the height and width Routine maintenanceItem 11 - Lawson cypress screen: Reduce by approx. 1-2m To maintain at current dimensions leaving a finished height of approx. 5m, width to remain the sameItem 14 - Large Sycamore x 2: Reduce by approximately 2 - 3 metres from the height and width Routine maintenance
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
